1.2.name: wordpress/freemind-wp-browser
1.2.description: This has been a modification of Joshua Eldridge' Flash Video Player. Powered by visorFreemind.swf from FreeMind Flash Browser and SWFObject by Geoff Stearns. This plugin allows graphic visualization of mindmaps created with FreeMind by embedding them to WordPress posts using flash. It looks for [freemind file="path-to-some-file.mm" /] shortcode in post to embed it in a Flash presentation of the FreeMind mindmap file (.mm format).
